LanguageData.RK_PlayerFaction.label: New Beginning
LanguageData.RK_PlayerFaction.description: It is your settlement. Their stories and destiny came together here.
LanguageData.Rakinia.label: ratkin kingdom
LanguageData.Rakinia.description: Ratkin Kingdom. It is a non-invasive species that lives invisible to human beings.
LanguageData.RatkinCaravan.label: ratkin caravan union
LanguageData.RatkinCaravan.description: Ratkin wanderers. They trade all over the place and buy and sell mercenaries.
